title: Chapter 1869 - The Great Realm Grand Tribulation, The Gods
body:
Chapter 1869 - The Great Realm Grand Tribulation, The Gods

Soon… it’s coming…

As the bloody battle raged, Su Yi had a powerful premonition that his Great Realm Grand Tribulation was imminent!

He was grievously injured and in dire peril. The way the Great Profound experts saw it, he was already an arrow at the end of its flight.

And in a sense, he was, but his will to fight was like the edge of a sword after endless tempering, sharper and more concentrated than ever before. His essence, qi, and spirit burned like a furnace, ever hotter!

The greater the danger, and the closer he was to death, the more Su Yi drew out his latent potential. It was as if his deeply buried vitality had been awakened. It was much like the time of awakening insects, when all living things flourished with new life!

“Die! Die! Die!”

The old monsters were red-eyed with murderous intent, and they used every method at their disposal, surrounding Su Yi and attacking like mad. They’d long since sensed that Su Yi had hidden cards up his sleeves, but even now, they’d yet to see him use them. They didn’t understand.

But this only made them even less willing to lower their guard...
original_title: Chapter 1869 - The Great Realm Grand Tribulation, the Gods
